distractors_added.location: setEmergencyOverride() function and deprecatedEmergencyThreshold state, suggesting configurable emergency parameters not referenced in emergencyCommit()
simulateExecution() external view helper performing low-level staticcall used only for off-chain tooling
_updateProposalMetrics() and _computeScore() internal functions plus proposalRiskScore, governanceActivityScore, proposalAnomalyCount fields implementing non-critical governance metrics
calculateParticipationRate() and getProposalHealthScore() view functions exposing derived governance statistics without affecting execution flow

actual_vulnerability.location: emergencyCommit() function in combination with deposit() and propose(), where immediate voting power and execution rules remain unchanged

notes: Trojan Horse transformation adds additional configuration-like state, execution simulators, and governance metric calculations while preserving the original governance behavior and execution rules in emergencyCommit().
